actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
actions.Name: Steel Fangs

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Noxious Gnash Noxious Gnash Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10% Duration: 20s Extends Noxious Gnash duration by 20s to a maximum of 40s.
actions.Name: Dread Fangs

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
actions.Name: Steel Maw

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Noxious Gnash Noxious Gnash Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10% Duration: 20s Extends Noxious Gnash duration by 20s to a maximum of 40s.
actions.Name: Dread Maw

actions.Description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 200.
actions.Name: Writhing Snap

actions.Description: Rush to a targetted enemy's or party member's location. Maximum Charges: 3 Cannot be executed while bound.
actions.Name: Slither

actions.Description: Changes to Death Rattle, Last Lash, First Legacy, Second Legacy, Third Legacy, or Fourth Legacy when requirements for execution are met.
actions.Name: Serpent's Tail

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 450. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Noxious Gnash Noxious Gnash Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10% Duration: 20s Extends Noxious Gnash duration by 20s to a maximum of 40s. Additional Effect: Grants a Rattling Coil, up to a maximum of 3. Maximum Charges: 2 Shares a recast timer with Pit of Dread.
actions.Name: Dreadwinder

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 500. 550 when executed from a target's flank. Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Instinct Hunter's Instinct Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10% Duration: 40s Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Venom Hunter's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinfang Bite by 50 Duration: 30s Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5 Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Bite, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Bite. These actions can be executed a total of two times following Hunter's Coil. Can only be executed after landing Dreadwinder or Swiftskin's Coil. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
actions.Name: Hunter's Coil

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 500. 550 when executed from a target's rear. Additional Effect: Grants Swiftscaled Swiftscaled Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10% Duration: 40s Additional Effect: Grants Swiftskin's Venom Swiftskin's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinblood Bite by 100 Duration: 30s Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5 Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Bite, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Bite. These actions can be executed a total of two times following Swiftskin's Coil. Can only be executed after landing Dreadwinder or Hunter's Coil. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
actions.Name: Swiftskin's Coil

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Noxious Gnash Noxious Gnash Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10% Duration: 20s Extends Noxious Gnash duration by 20s to a maximum of 40s. Additional Effect: Grants a Rattling Coil, up to a maximum of 3. Maximum Charges: 2 Shares a recast timer with Dreadwinder.
actions.Name: Pit of Dread

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Instinct Hunter's Instinct Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10% Duration: 40s Additional Effect: Grants Fellhunter's Venom Fellhunter's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinfang Thresh by 50 Duration: 30s Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5 Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Thresh, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Thresh. These actions can be executed a total of two times following Hunter's Den. Can only be executed after landing Pit of Dread or Swiftskin's Den. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
actions.Name: Hunter's Den

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Grants Swiftscaled Swiftscaled Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10% Duration: 40s Additional Effect: Grants Fellskin's Venom Fellskin's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinblood Thresh by 50 Duration: 30s Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5 Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Thresh, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Thresh. These actions can be executed a total of two times following Swiftskin's Den. Can only be executed after landing Pit of Dread or Hunter's Den. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
actions.Name: Swiftskin's Den

actions.Description: Changes to Twinfang Bite, Twinfang Thresh, or Uncoiled Twinfang when requirements for execution are met.
actions.Name: Twinfang

actions.Description: Changes to Twinblood Bite, Twinblood Thresh, or Uncoiled Twinblood when requirements for execution are met.
actions.Name: Twinblood

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 500 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Grants Poised for Twinfang Poised for Twinfang Effect: Increases the potency of Uncoiled Twinfang by 100. Duration: 60s Rattling Coil Cost: 1 This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
actions.Name: Uncoiled Fury

actions.Description: Grants one stack of Rattling Coil. Grants Ready to Rewawaken. Duration: 30s
actions.Name: Serpent's Ire

actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 600 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Anguine Tribute Duration: 30s Serpent Offerings Gauge Cost: 50
actions.Name: Reawaken

roleActions.Description: Reduces damage taken by 10%. Duration: 6s Additional Effect: When you are struck, the striker's damage dealt will be reduced by 10% Duration: 6s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du verringerst deinen erlittenen Schaden um 10 % und führst eine Konterattacke auf den Angreifer aus.

Dauer: 6 Sekunden

Zusatzeffekt der Konterattacke: Verringert von Angreifern ausgeteilten Schaden um 10%.

Dauer: 6 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Réduit de 10% vos dégâts subis et lance un contre affaiblissant chaque fois que vous vous faites toucher. Durée: 6s Effet du contre affaiblissant: réduit de 10% les dégâts infligés par l'assaillant. Durée: 6s
roleActions.Description_ja: 自身の被ダメージを10％軽減させ、かつ自身が攻撃を受けた場合に反撃効果を与える。 効果時間：6秒 反撃効果：攻撃者の与ダメージを10％減少させる。 効果時間：6秒
roleActions.Name: Arm's Length

roleActions.Description: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP. Duration: 20s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du absorbierst einen Teil des physischen Schadens, den du austeilst, als eigene LP.

Dauer: 20 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Convertit une partie des dégâts infligés par vos attaques physiques en PV. Durée: 20s
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、自身の物理攻撃に、与えたダメージの一部をＨＰとして吸収する効果を付与する。　効果時間：20秒
roleActions.Name: Bloodbath

roleActions.Description: Instantly restores own HP. Cure Potency: 500
roleActions.Description_ja: 自身のＨＰを回復する。　回復力：500
roleActions.Name: Second Wind

roleActions.Description: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%. Duration: 10s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du verringerst den ausgeteilten physischen Schaden um 10% und den ausgeteilten magischen Schaden um 5%.

Dauer: 10 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Réduit respectivement de 10% et 5% les dégâts physiques et magiques infligés par la cible. Durée: 10s
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、対象の与物理ダメージを10％、与魔法ダメージを5％減少させる。　効果時間：10秒
roleActions.Name: Feint

roleActions.Description_de: Du fügst dem Ziel Betäubung zu. Dauer: 3 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Inflige Étourdissement à la cible. Durée: 3s
roleActions.Description_ja: 対象をスタンさせる。　効果時間：3秒
roleActions.Name: Leg Sweep

roleActions.Description: Nullifies all action direction requirements. Duration: 10s Maximum Charges: 2
roleActions.Description_de:
Alle Richtungsbedingungen deiner Kommandos werden als erfüllt betrachtet, egal, aus welcher Richtung du sie ausführst.

Dauer: 10 Sekunden

Maximale Aufladungen: 2
roleActions.Description_fr: Fait réussir les actions directionnelles dans n'importe quelle position. Durée: 10s Maximum de charges: 2
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、方向指定条件のあるアクションをどの方向から実行しても成功させる。　効果時間：10秒 最大チャージ数：2
roleActions.Name: True North
